title: Inside Out Stuffed Pepper Casserole
directions: Boil broth and pour over rice in greased 9 x 13 " pan. Brown meat with pepper and onion. Drain well. Add sauce and pour over rice. Sprinkle with cheese.
Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes uncovered.
ingredients: 2 medium bell peppers, seeded and chopped
1 1/2 cups spaghetti sauce or 1 1/2 cups tomato sauce
